title: Impact of Example Study and Problem-Solving Sequence on Learning Outcomes

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematical concepts and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Advanced professional training for leaders/managers, conducted in a smartphone-based learning environment with limited technological resources.

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% accuracy by applying example-based learning (EBL) and example-problem pairing (EP) strategies
Learners report 20%+ higher self-efficacy and perceived competence in example-centered learning compared to problem-based learning (PBL, PPL)
Learners apply evaluation tools comparing efficiency relative to learning time (e.g., 15% time reduction for equivalent outcomes)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
